mdRecord.dcterms:title: University of Virginia Printing Services photograph file and index 1965-1973
Skinner file and index
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Skinner, David M., 1921-2009
University of Virginia. Printing Services.
University of Virginia. University Photographer.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The collection consists of photographs and negatives from the non-portrait file of Dave Skinner, the photographer for the University of Virginia Graphic Communications Services.
The photographs and negatives are in sequence by their file numbers, not the original job order numbers stamped on them.
A card index to the collection is available
A listing of scenes containing women is available
